long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Packed extension with below features:
- Display external IP
- Open current tab in incognito mode or chromeless mode
- Shortcuts to extensions, passwords and keyboard shortcuts, browser flags screens
- Shortcuts to clean up current website data, download history, reload unpacked extensions, mute/unmute current/all tabs, pin/unpin current/all tabs, toggle JS activation
- Shortcuts to unobfuscate password fields, save current website favicon
- NAS management features (WOL, access) > optional
- Useful links to Chrome related pages (webstore dev dashboard, extensions documentation...)
- Manage extensions (list, activate/deactivate, access options and local path, make sure to allow local file access for the latest)
- Display Phone SPAM List > optional
- Generate data URI from file or SVG file from inline SVG
- Text transformation tools (case, encoding/decoding, hashing, timestamp...)
